meanings.definition: The condition of having a protruding jaw.
meanings.sent1: His prognathism made his jaw stand out prominently.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with prognathism after examining his jaw alignment.
meanings.sent3: The prognathism of the cartoon character gave him a unique and comical appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her prognathism was like a bulldozer, pushing through any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The prognathism of the ancient statue was striking, emphasizing its strength and power.

meanings.definition: The state of having a lower jaw that extends beyond the upper jaw.
meanings.sent1: The severe prognathism caused difficulties in the patient's bite alignment.
meanings.sent2: In severe cases of prognathism, orthodontic treatment may be necessary to correct the jaw position.
meanings.sent3: The prognathism of the dog made it look like it was always sticking its chin out in defiance.
meanings.sent4: Her prognathism was a bridge connecting her to her ancestors, a physical link to the past.
meanings.sent5: The prognathism of the ancient skull revealed the diet and lifestyle of its owner.
